mision.mis-p1: We are a law firm specialized in immigration matters, we provide legal advice and representation services to people seeking to obtain residency or citizenship in a foreign country. We know that changing residence or establishing a business in another country often involves a life or business plan. Our commitment at Carbonell + Zapata, S.C. to the development and success of our clients' businesses is total. Our mission is to be a reference in the market, providing high quality services and a personalized treatment to our clients.
mision.mis-p2: To achieve this mission, Carbonell + Zapata, S.C., has a team of lawyers and advisors with experience in the immigration area. Experience of more than 18 years in the MIGRATION MATTERS, advising investors and professionals who wish to live and/or create a business and settle in Mexico and/or the United States.
mision.mis-p3: We offer a wide variety of services to facilitate the entry of our clients into the labor or business market of these two countries.

vision.vis-p: Through continuous improvement, specialization and professionalization, Carbonell + Zapata, S.C. aspires to position itself as one of the law firms of reference in the national and international arena, exceeding those of its clients for economic, labor, professional or leisure reasons in the United States or Mexico.

cont-team.german-p1: Attorney with triple citizenship, Mexican, Spanish and American, member of the American Bar Association (ABA) and the Hispanic National Bar Association (HNBA) with over 18 continuous years of experience in immigration matters, has a deep understanding of the complex immigration laws and regulations and ability to navigate the legal system to get results.
cont-team.german-p2: Has helped people from all over the world achieve their immigration goals. Passionate about helping his clients build a better life for themselves and their families and committed to providing the best possible legal representation.
cont-team.german-p3: His academic background includes a law degree from the Universidad Intercontinental in Mexico City and a Master of Laws degree in the United States Legal System from Washington University School of Law in St. Louis, Missouri, USA.
cont-team.german-p4: For almost two decades he has worked directly in specialized immigration law firms in the State of Tennessee.
cont-team.eder-p1: Trained as a lawyer at the FACULTAD de DERECHO of the UNIVERSIDAD NACIONAL AUTONOMA DE MEXICO, with more than 11 years of practice in immigration law, experience in public administration and litigation in Mexico.
cont-team.eder-p2: President since 2017 of the Civil Association Guerrero Contigo Paisano, a non-profit organization in charge of providing advice, information and assistance in any immigration issue or process to nationals in Mexico, United States and Canada, achieving the legal migration of applicants.
cont-team.eder-p3: Passionate about the complex Mexico-United States-Canada relationship, such trilateral symbiosis implies, knowledge in economy, security, migration, culture, politics, ecology, legislation and governance of the three countries.
